docstring.long_description:
The channel output state is not save (i.e. if the channel was outputing).

This block should also work with compatible Tektronix AFG31XXX instruments.
docstring.short_description: Saves or recalls the state for the AFG31000.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_AFG31000 block).

parameters.name: save_recall
parameters.description: Save or recall the save state.
